title: Wrench
developerAddress: House # 616, Street # 69, Sector I-8/3, Islamabad, Pakistan.
description: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot; but make it hot by striking. The strong metal gear solid tools gives you the feeling of ruggedness.  This watch face chains up the metal ruggedness in nuts and bolts. The watch is analog where wrench is representing hour and minute clock. It also displays the date and day. When the watch is not in use the watch face goes into ambient mode which saves the battery, just by showing the time.
descriptionHTML: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot; but make it hot by striking. The strong metal gear solid tools gives you the feeling of ruggedness. When the watch is not in use the watch face goes into ambient mode which saves the battery, just by showing the time.
